summary: WHEN IT RAINED, WATER LEAKED INSIDE THE VEHICLE. *JB   DEALER REPAIRED DRAIN HOSES AT REAR.  BURNING WIRE SMELL WITH HEATER ON.  LACK OF POWER.  RADIO INOPERATIVE.  ERRATIC OPERATION OF THE DASH LIGHTS.  MIRROR LIGHTS STAYED ON WHEN VEHICLE WAS SHUT OFF.  DEALER INSPECTED ELECTRICAL CONNECTIONS TO HEATER. CHECKED WIRING UNDER DASH AND FOUND OK.  DISCONNECTED STERIO POWER AMP AND RESET BODY CONTROL MODULE.         *TT
